addworkload.name: AddWorkload
addworkload.description: Grants permission to add a workload

createapplication.name: CreateApplication
createapplication.description: Grants permission to create an application from a resource group

createcomponent.name: CreateComponent
createcomponent.description: Grants permission to create a component from a group of resources

createlogpattern.name: CreateLogPattern
createlogpattern.description: Grants permission to create log a pattern

deleteapplication.name: DeleteApplication

deletelogpattern.description: Grants permission to delete a log pattern

describeapplication.name: DescribeApplication
describeapplication.description: Grants permission to describe an application

describecomponent.name: DescribeComponent
describecomponent.description: Grants permission to describe a component

describecomponentconfiguration.name: DescribeComponentConfiguration
describecomponentconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe a component's configuration

describecomponentconfigurationrecommenda.name: DescribeComponentConfigurationRecommendation
describecomponentconfigurationrecommenda.description: Grants permission to describe the recommended application component configuration

describelogpattern.name: DescribeLogPattern
describelogpattern.description: Grants permission to describe a log pattern

describeobservation.name: DescribeObservation
describeobservation.description: Grants permission to describe an observation

describeproblem.name: DescribeProblem
describeproblem.description: Grants permission to describe a problem

describeproblemobservations.description: Grants permission to describe the observation in a problem

describeworkload.name: DescribeWorkload
describeworkload.description: Grants permission to describe a workload

link.name: Link
link.description: Grants permission to share Application Insights resources with a monitoring account

listapplications.name: ListApplications
listapplications.description: Grants permission to list all applications

listcomponents.name: ListComponents
listcomponents.description: Grants permission to list an application's components

listconfigurationhistory.name: ListConfigurationHistory
listconfigurationhistory.description: Grants permission to list configuration history

listlogpatternsets.description: Grants permission to list log pattern sets for an application

listlogpatterns.name: ListLogPatterns
listlogpatterns.description: Grants permission to list log patterns

listproblems.name: ListProblems
listproblems.description: Grants permission to list the problems in an application

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for the resource

removeworkload.name: RemoveWorkload
removeworkload.description: Grants permission to remove a workload

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource
